targets.query:
from(bucket: "icinga2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "$service")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "$hostname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _value: r._value,
        _time: r._time,
        _field: "${r["metric"]}"
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "metric" where hostname =~ /^$hostname$/ AND service =~ /^$service$/
list.name: metric
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "metric" where hostname =~ /^$hostname$/ AND service =~ /^$service$/
